DOC.detailed_description: Study design A 10-year follow-up study randomize controlled clinical trial ( RCT ) carry 2001 2003 , include assessment patient satisfaction , denture repair/replacement OHRQoL . Data gather telephone interview . Since contact last use decade ago , phone number may change , make every effort find new number participant contact information longer valid . Subjects Patients participate complete 6-month follow-up RCT ( T group : 50 , S group : 54 ; total 104 subject ) contact telephone . Interviews blind Potential subject tell investigate condition dentures 10-years delivery ask general question , well rating satisfaction OHRQoL regard denture . After , subject ask whether willing respond interview . If agree , interviewer ask question accord flow chart ( Appendix 1a , b ) . The subject tell group assign , blind research assistant carry interview data gathering . The research assistant work participant active study 10 year . Patients exclude respond properly question . Questionnaires Data gather four questionnaire : socio-demographic ( Q1 : Appendix 2 ) , denture history/oral health ( Q2 : Appendix 3 ) , general relate satisfaction outcome answer VAS ( visual analog scale ) score 100 ( Q3 : Appendix 4 ) , OHQOL measure ( OHIP-EDENT ) 12 , 13 ( Q4 : Appendix 5 ) . Analysis Denture history The difference number people keep use dentures 10 year calculate percentage . A Chi-squared test employ statistical analysis . Finally , prevalence problem associate denture calculate . Satisfaction The difference treatment group general satisfaction rating 100mm VAS prosthesis wear 10 year . A two-sample independent t-test employ . VAS item comfort , stability , esthetic , retention , function ease cleaning also include . These compare group use t-tests . OHRQoL OHIP-EDENT consist 19 statement responses vary 0 4 Likert scale . The possible range 0 76 derive individually compare two group . A two-sample independent t-test employed .
